definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: speckled;—only of sheep and goats; ´[[נ]] Ge 30:32, Ge 30:32, fpl. [[נְקֻדּוֹת]] v:Ge 30:35 (all ‖[[טָלוּא]]), mpl. [[נְקֻדִּים]] v:Ge 30:39 (‖ id. + [[עֲקֻדִּים]];—a11 these J); mpl. also Ge 31:8, Ge 31:8 and (+ [[עֲקֻדִּים]], [[בְּרֻדִּים]]) v:Ge 31:10; v:Ge 31:12 (all E).
